H0.text: If all the elements in the periodic table were placed in alphabetical order, which would be the first listed that is represented by a single letter symbol. Beryllium

H1.text: If all the elements in the periodic table were placed in alphabetical order, which would be the first listed that is represented by a single letter symbol. Boron

H2.text: If all the elements in the periodic table were placed in alphabetical order, which would be the first listed that is represented by a single letter symbol. Carbon

H3.text: If all the elements in the periodic table were placed in alphabetical order, which would be the first listed that is represented by a single letter symbol. Burah

A4.text: Boron is a chemical element; it has symbol B and atomic number 5.
